price: No se les aliviará [el castigo] ni tendrán esperanza [de salir algún día].
arabic: لَا يُفَتَّرُ عَنۡهُمۡ وَهُمۡ فِيهِ مُبۡلِسُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: lā yufattaru ʿanhum wahum fīhi mub'lisūna
